mapper.select: select APP_ACCOUNT, APP_PASSWORD, PRODUCTION_DEVID, PRODUCTION_APPID, PRODUCTION_CERTID, PRODUCTION_TOKEN, EBAY_ACCOUNT, CALL_LIMITATION, SANDBOX_DEVID, SANDBOX_APPID, SANDBOX_CERTID, SANDBOX_TOKEN, TOKEN_EXPIRE_TIME from EB_APP_ACCOUNT where APP_ACCOUNT = #{appAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select APP_ACCOUNT, APP_PASSWORD, PRODUCTION_DEVID, PRODUCTION_APPID, PRODUCTION_CERTID, PRODUCTION_TOKEN, EBAY_ACCOUNT, CALL_LIMITATION, SANDBOX_DEVID, SANDBOX_APPID, SANDBOX_CERTID, SANDBOX_TOKEN, TOKEN_EXPIRE_TIME from EB_APP_ACCOUNT
mapper.insert: insert into EB_APP_ACCOUNT (APP_ACCOUNT, APP_PASSWORD, PRODUCTION_DEVID, PRODUCTION_APPID, PRODUCTION_CERTID, PRODUCTION_TOKEN, EBAY_ACCOUNT, CALL_LIMITATION, SANDBOX_DEVID, SANDBOX_APPID, SANDBOX_CERTID, SANDBOX_TOKEN, TOKEN_EXPIRE_TIME) values (#{appAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #callLimitation:DECIMAL#, #{sandboxDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sandboxAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sandboxCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sandboxToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update EB_APP_ACCOUNT set APP_PASSWORD = #{appPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_DEVID = #{productionDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_APPID = #{productionAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_CERTID = #{productionCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_TOKEN = #{productionToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EBAY_ACCOUNT = #{ebayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALL_LIMITATION = #callLimitation:DECIMAL#, SANDBOX_DEVID = #{sandboxDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_APPID = #{sandboxAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_CERTID = #{sandboxCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_TOKEN = #{sandboxToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOKEN_EXPIRE_TIME = #{tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where APP_ACCOUNT = #{appAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update EB_APP_ACCOUNT set APP_ACCOUNT = #{record.appAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_PASSWORD = #{record.appPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_DEVID = #{record.productionDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_APPID = #{record.productionAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_CERTID = #{record.productionCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_TOKEN = #{record.productionToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EBAY_ACCOUNT = #{record.ebayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALL_LIMITATION = #record.callLimitation:DECIMAL#, SANDBOX_DEVID = #{record.sandboxDevid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_APPID = #{record.sandboxAppid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_CERTID = #{record.sandboxCertid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SANDBOX_TOKEN = #{record.sandboxToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOKEN_EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.tokenExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
